body:
Error pops up at random (bottom red flashing icon) "IDE Internal Error Occurred"

When clicking the icon a window opens and displays:
Exception in plugin Flutter. Occurred once since the last clear. Submitted. Disable plugin...
Plus the exception report below.


## Version information
Android Studio `3.3` ‚Ä¢ Flutter plugin `io.flutter 31.3.3` ‚Ä¢ Dart plugin `182.5124`
Error getting Flutter sdk information.
## Exception

null

comment_data.body:
Thanks for the report @unitedonline. üëç 

@devoncarew : #3086 will improve this?

It's possible - I didn't track down all the use cases. We should definitely declare bug debt for issues w/ this symptom that were reported using versions before our next release. If problems still remain, we'll see them in new issues.
I believe this has been fixed. If it hasn't been fixed let me know and I'll apply a similar fix to the one discussed to fix the particular case that is still occurring.

milestone.description: Issues under consideration for upcoming milestones.
milestone.title: On Deck

title: Error getting Flutter sdk information.
